result.title: Report and proposal for model sustainability business plan for ERICs
result.description: The activities of Task 44 will include Adaptation of CANVAS modeling tool Mapping of existing business models and analysis of their performance Two restitution workshops the first M22 aimed at educating on business modeling and related survey tools the second M40 aimed at validating the conclusions and achieve the necessary consensus Recommendations based on the analysis of the various business models and on the output of task 41 42 and 43 recommendations for long term sustainability will be made the principles of which shall be applicable to all ERICs regardless of their scientific backgroundTask 44 will indirectly contribute to the development of the SEI ERIC Framework within Task 43 by systematically improving the policyfundingresearchdissemination continuum The outcome of Task 44 will be Deliverable D44 Report and proposal for a model sustainability plan for ERICs

result.title: Business and sustainability models for large-scale IoT scenarios
result.description: D02.05 Business and sustainability models for large-scale IoT scenarios: This deliverable will present the analysis of the different business models derived from the experiences in the LSP and how they can be used for the creation of sustainability models not only restricted to individual domains but combining several. (IDATE, SINTEF, ATOS, IDC, TL, GRAD, NUIG)
